title: How to get a certificate for my font?
content:
I read the articles in microsoft and it tells me if I want to sign a font file “for real” I need to obtain files from Certification Authority such as Verisign. Then what kind of certificate should I buy? Would you tell me how to sign my font successfully without the Warning: This file is signed, but not timestamped.Thank you very much.
